data.desc: Buccaneers or privateers roam off Sp Hon
data.note:
Possibly see 1640 Guat. Pres Álvaro de Quiñónez y Osorio, Antonio Justiniano Chavarri 400 militiamen march towards Bay of Amatique to engage Du pirates, but on reaching Mixco [Guat] Pres orders march aborted /v Guat DNB 531, 763 /
 Possibly see 1639 Puerto Caballos, Golfo Dulce, Truxillo attacked by Pir / 1640 Amatique, Truxillo attacked by Pir /v Lujan 2 472, 826
